articles.author: Matias Grez
articles.title: Indiana Pacers steal win over the Milwaukee Bucks with Tyrese Haliburton’s last-ditch four-point play - CNN
articles.description: Tyrese Haliburton completed a wild four-point play with just 3.4 seconds remaining on Tuesday night to earn the Indiana Pacers a nail-biting 115-114 win over the Milwaukee Bucks.
articles.content:
Tyrese Haliburton completed a wild four-point play with just 3.4 seconds remaining on Tuesday night to earn the Indiana Pacers a nail-biting 115-114 win over the Milwaukee Bucks.
